entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump This week, only in the last 4  days, you had the biggest number of American people succumb to the deadly Covid19. Kindly focus on how to fight better. Your economy is number one in the world, it will bounce back of its own. don't worry too much about it.
